Title: Secure the Beach
Description:
Queensguard Zirix emerged from the ground and surprised Magni.

He's near the farthest edge of the wreckage fighting off his swarm.

Moira and I were trying to help, but we couldn't draw them away.

Come with me. Magni needs our help!
ObjectivesText: Find Magni and defeat Queensguard Zirix.
PortraitGiverText: If Zirix's onslaught is not stopped, the survivors of Dalaran will be wiped out.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Baelgrim at the Tranquil Strand.
RewardText:
You may not be trespassers, but you are not our allies either, outlander.

If you are to blame for the nerubians emerging, then you are responsible for the attack on Dornogal as well.
